definitions: not having enough or the usual number of staff or crew

examples.text: the kitchen was a bit short-handed
because two cashiers were out with the flu, we worked short-handed

shortDefinitions: not having enough or usual number of staff or crew

definitions: (of a goal) scored by a team playing with fewer players on the ice than their opponent.
shortDefinitions: (of goal) scored by team playing with fewer players on ice than their opponent

definitions: (of a situation) occurring while or because a team has fewer than six players on the ice.
shortDefinitions: (of situation) occurring while or because team has fewer than six players on ice
